markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Kortos Mounts Gazetteer](/Articles.aspx?ID=19)</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 58

The legendary mountain range at the center of the Isle of Kortos holds monstrous denizens, local legends, and countless opportunities for exciting adventures.
name: Kortos Mounts Gazetteer
